titles.title: To terminate the limitations on imports of ammonium nitrate from the Russian Federation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 7/25/2006--Introduced. Declares that no limitations contained in the Agreement Suspending the Antidumping Investigation on Solid Fertilizer Grade Ammonium Nitrate shall be imposed with respect to entry of any solid fertilizer grade ammonium nitrate imported from the Russian Federation. States that no antidumping duty deposit shall be required upon entry of such a product, nor shall any antidumping duty be assessed on it.
